sentences.en: We are catching the Disney Cruise transport to the terminal at Port Canaveral for the Disney Treasure.
sentences.zh: 我们要坐迪士尼邮轮接驳车去卡纳维拉尔港的码头，搭乘迪士尼宝藏号邮轮。
sentences.phonetic_us: /wi ɑr ˈkætʃɪŋ ðə ˈdɪzni kruz ˈtrænspɔrt tə ðə ˈtɜrmənəl æt pɔrt kəˈnævərəl fɔr ðə ˈdɪzni ˈtrɛʒər/

sentences.en: So we got an e-mail night before last, wasn't it? I think so, yeah.
sentences.zh: 前天晚上我们收到了邮件，对吧？我记得是这样，没错。
sentences.phonetic_us: /soʊ wi ɡɑt ən iˈmeɪl naɪt bɪˈfɔr læst, ˈwɑzənt ɪt? aɪ θɪŋk soʊ, jæ/

sentences.en: So basically it tells you where you're going to be meeting the cruise line staff, at what time.
sentences.zh: 这封邮件告诉我们在哪里与邮轮公司的工作人员会面，以及具体的时间。
sentences.phonetic_us: /soʊ ˈbeɪsɪkli ɪt tɛlz ju wɛr jʊr ˈɡoʊɪŋ tə bi ˈmitɪŋ ðə kruz laɪn stæf, æt wʌt taɪm/

sentences.en: So we've got to be there at 9:00 for a 9:30 departure in the main Polynesian lobby.
sentences.zh: 我们需要在上午9点到达，这样可以在9点30分从波利尼西亚大堂出发。
sentences.phonetic_us: /soʊ wiv ɡɑt tə bi ðɛr æt naɪn fɔr ə naɪn ˈθɜrti dɪˈpɑrtʃər ɪn ðə meɪn ˌpɑləˈniʒən ˈlɑbi/

sentences.en: And it also gave instructions on where you leave your luggage.
sentences.zh: 邮件还写明了行李存放的地点。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ænd ɪt ˈɔlsoʊ ɡeɪv ɪnˈstrʌkʃənz ɑn wɛr ju liv jʊr ˈlʌɡɪdʒ/

sentences.en: So you basically leave your luggage by the door, they said.
sentences.zh: 他们说，你只需将行李放在门旁边。
sentences.phonetic_us: /soʊ ju ˈbeɪsɪkli liv jʊr ˈlʌɡɪdʒ baɪ ðə dɔr, ðeɪ sɛd/

sentences.en: And they begin collecting your bags from 7:00 AM. But you don't have to be in the room for it. They will let themselves in and collect the bags.
sentences.zh: 他们会从上午7点开始收行李。你不需要留在房间里。他们会自行进入房间并取走行李。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ænd ðeɪ bɪˈɡɪn kəˈlɛktɪŋ jʊr bæɡz frəm ˈsɛvən eɪ ɛm. bʌt ju doʊnt hæv tə bi ɪn ðə rum fɔr ɪt. ðeɪ wɪl lɛt ðəmˈsɛlvz ɪn ænd kəˈlɛkt ðə bæɡz/
